details: Facilitated planning and execution of community ideas and collaborated with other administratives and leads to plan projects for the community.

EXPERIENCE.company: Boa : a Rust based JavaScript engine
details: Implemented changes to allow Binding Patterns as parameters in Javascript functions.
Researched and selected the appropriate model and its components.
Performed model selection, data processing and model training for hg-Chatbot, one of the community projects
Managed code reviews and authorization of the project repository

PROJECTS.name: Ecriture
details: A cloud based scraping project, primarily aimed at scraping the job opportunities from different major companies
It aims at scraping dynamic websites opposed to classical scraping that only aims static sites

PROJECTS.name: HG-Chatbot
details: This is a community project aimed at building a chatbot as part of the Data Science and AI community
Used Reddit-conversation dataset for training a transformer based NLP model
